## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing (`uv run pytest`)
- [ ] Code formatted and linted (`uv run ruff format && uv run ruff check`)
- [ ] Type hints added and mypy passes (`uv run mypy src/pyfia/`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Results validated against EVALIDator (if estimation changes)
